Scale space hydrograph analysis

Source: vignettes/scale-space.Rmd
scale-space.Rmd

grwat package contains tools for performing scale space analysis of hydrograph. Initially developed by (Witkin 1984), this method allows decomposition of a signal into hierarchically arranged multiscale components.

Currently grwat depends on Scale4C (Walter 2019) package from Biconductor.

library(grwat)
#> Загрузка требуемого пакета: magrittr
#> Загрузка требуемого пакета: ggplot2
#> Welcome to grwat package for hydrograph separation and analysis

Walter, Carolin. 2019. Scale4C: An R/Bioconductor Package for Scale-Space Transformation of 4C-Seq Data.

Witkin, A. 1984. “Scale-Space Filtering: A New Approach to Multi-Scale Description.” In ICASSP ’84. IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing, 9:150–53. San Diego, CA, USA: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers. https://doi.org/10.1109/ICASSP.1984.1172729.

Developed by Timofey Samsonov, Ekaterina Retz, Maria Kireeva.
